page.title: 18Hostelries.
page.content: The local pub is quite a social gathering place for the village. It is run by a husband and wife team and they employ about six bar staff. There is a very pleasant garden. They sometimes organise their own functions such as fancy dress parties on New Years Eve and have discos on Public Holidays such as Easter Monday, May Day etc.. In addition they have an outside barbecue which they use on occasions through the year. There is a carvery style restaurant, and reasonably priced lunches and bar snacks are also served. There is a billiards table- there is a team representing The Horseshoe, and also a darts team. The Horseshoe does not cater for weddings. The other local restaurant is at the Motel which is A.A. and R.A.C. listed and in addition to the restaurant has 49 bedrooms, bars and conference room.
